response.job_title: Leader of Commissioning, energy efficiency  and energy modeling
response.summary: Mechanical engineer focused on energy efficiency and sustainability with four years of experience in consulting of high-performance buildings and 8 months conducting  energy audits to state buildings in Colombia.
response.skills: Liderazgo de equipos, Simulaciones Energéticas, Construcción Sostenible, Java, Python, Design builder, Gestión de proyectos, Planificación estratégica, Trabajo en equipo, AutoCAD, Autodesk Inventor, Resolución de problemas, Microsoft Office, Matlab, Toma de decisiones, Aptitudes de organización, Fomento de la confianza

profile_positions.description: Lead and coordinate the energy modeling team, bioclimatic design, and commissioning team, conducting the teamwork towards building projects with high performance and working with the certification sustainable teams LEED, EDGE, and CASA Colombia to conduct the energy models and the commissioning process.
profile_positions.title: Leader of Commissioning, energy efficiency  and energy modeling

profile_positions.description: Lead and coordinate the energy modeling and bioclimatic team, conducting teamwork toward building projects with high performance. Work with the certification sustainable teams LEED, EDGE, and CASA Colombia to conduct the necessary support and energy models to achieve the proposed goals. Conduct the required simulations in the DesignBUilder software: CFD, energy consumption, Daylight, natural ventilation, and doing the technical support and energy efficiency reports.
profile_positions.title: Leader of Bioclimatic Design and energy modeling

profile_positions.description:
Support the bioclimatic team to conduct thermodynamic simulations, natural light simulations, and consumption analysis of the metro stations and buildings of the First Metro Line of Bogota (PLMB), using DesignBuilder and Revit .
Standards used: ASHRAE 90.1-2010-2016, ASHRAE 62.1 2016, ASHRAE 55 2017.
profile_positions.title: Project engineer

profile_positions.company: ANDRÉS GARCÍA Ingeniería Bioclimática y Sostenible
profile_positions.description:
Support the decision-making process of sustainable buildings design by conducting bioclimatic studies with DesignBuilder. 
Standards Used: ASHRAE 90.1 -2010, ASHRAE 62.1 2016,ASHRAE 55 2017.
profile_positions.title: Coordinator of simulations and bioclimatic studies

profile_positions.description: Perform the design of air conditioning systems and mechanical ventilation for industrial buildings using modeling software as Revit, Elite and AutoCAD.
profile_positions.title: Project engineer

profile_positions.description: Doing energy audits to state buildings in Colombia under the norm ISO 50002 and advising  clients in the sustainable construction process for the HQE, LEED certifications and topics related with energy efficiency. The standards used are ASHRAE 90.1 -2010-2016, ASHRAE 62.1 2016,ASHRAE 55 2017.
profile_positions.title: Project engineer

profile_positions.description: Advising clients in the  development of construction projects to get the EDGE  or LEED certifications, getting sustainable buildings with a high energy performance , decision-making support  through energy simulations with Design Building software, optimizing the resources used as water, energy and materials, The standards used are ASHRAE 90.1 -2010-2016, ASHRAE 62.1 2016,ASHRAE 55 2017.
profile_positions.title: Project management

profile_positions.description: Designing environmental awareness campaigns for University campus about solid waste segregation and the efficient use of water and energy.
profile_positions.title: Environmental promoter

education.degree_name: International digital Certified in edification with energy efficiency and adaptative comfort-

Java programming certified of 200 hours offered by the Ministry of Information Technologies
Project management course under PMI guidelines
"Mision TIC 2022 - Ruta de aprendizaje 2" con profundizacion en "Desarrollo de aplicaciones Web""

company.name: SUMAC
company.description: SUMAC is an architecture, engineering, and consulting firm that promotes sustainability as the key element to increasing the profitability of our clients and partners. With offices in the USA, Argentina, Colombia, Peru, Ecuador, Mexico, Chile, and Spain, SUMAC has worked on projects in more than 80 cities.
